title: Sentouin, Hakenshimasu! (Combatants Will Be Dispatched!)
synopsis: As a chief operative of the villainous Kisaragi Corporation, Sentouin Roku-gou receives orders to help the organization conquer the entire known universe. Tasked with infiltrating the kingdom of Grace—a mission that could change the fate of the world—Roku-gou mistakenly believes that his skills as a combatant are superb, fuelling his arrogant attitude. To ensure the success of the mission, Alice Kisaragi, an exceptional android with a youthful appearance named after the company itself, is assigned to be Roku-gou's travel companion.
voices: ['Tomita, Miyu', 'Shirai, Yuusuke', 'Murakami, Natsumi', 'Takahashi, Minami', 'Kikuchi, Sayaka', 'Watabe, Sayumi', 'Ishihara, Kaori', 'Hidaka, Rina']
staff: [['Akagi, Hiroaki', ['Director']], ['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', ['Sound Director']], ['Itou, Miku', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tomita, Miyu', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
